name: Langley
description:
A lonely man in Afghanistan discovers the true meaning of imperialism.

What people are saying:

AlphaBetaGamer: "Langley is a touching and troubling game."

NivelOculto (Spanish): "A punch in the stomach"

Oujevipo (French): "Make yourself confortable, enjoy the music and be prepared to rediscover the Afghanistan post 9/11"
